heading: Today
text: Clouds giving way to sun south. Some afternoon clearing north.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mostly clear this evening. Patchy fog east. Increasing clouds.

heading: Friday
text: Rain developing in NY, spreading east midday and afternoon.

heading: Saturday
text: Cloudy. Rain or wintry mix south later in the day.
temperature: Mid 30s to around 40 north, upper 30s to mid 40s south
